about_the_game:
Ancient Demon Shadow is a game that combines side-scrolling and exploration. In the battle between gods and demons 60,000 years ago, the world gathered top mages with the help of the Giant Modao clan to seal the Evil God King in Ancient Demon City. However, over the years, the population in Ancient Demon City has dwindled and the magic has weakened. The Evil God King has transformed his power into several major demons, seducing many government officials from different countries into soul trades to control them and break the seal of Ancient Demon City. Therefore, a mysterious hero has summoned players to eliminate him.

Game Features:
1 Semi-Open World: Explore a semi-open world that includes various side-scrolling mechanisms.
2 Includes various hidden elements, hidden items that, when collected, can enhance character attributes.
3 Latest lighting and shadow rendering enhances the gaming experience.
4 Rich and colorful world, with a variety of ancient epic stories behind it.
5 A large number of high-quality music tracks, featuring various atmospheres and styles
6 After upgrading, you can master multiple magic spells, projectiles, transformations, and summoning of creatures.

short_description: Set in a vibrant and diverse otherworld, players will navigate through intricate puzzles, collect experience points, and train themselves to become stronger. Utilizing a variety of weapons and magic, they must eliminate massive creatures and monsters.
